title: Buccaneers sleepers, predicting defensive breakouts with Sam Monson (Football 8/14)
description:
Will Brinson and Sean Wagner-McGough break down the latest news around the NFL, including the terrifying Andrew Luck injury (2:00), if Roquan Smith is a good DPOY bet (13:00), the latest Antonio Brown news (17:00), Daniel Jones never sees the filed (22:00) and Tony Romo talking Ezekiel Elliott (24:00). Then the guys welcome on Sam Monson of Pro Football Focus to talk about the change in analytics including the use of a WAR style metric (28:00), how big the shift to nickel defenses has become and if teams will run at it (35:00), how to spot a defensive breakout (40:00), why the Buccaneers can break out (47:00), why PFF loves the Steelers (51:00), what to expect from the Browns (54:00), which second year QB could break out (57:00) and much more. 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
